summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Fairview-Valley corridor realignment project; authorizing acquisition of certain real property and property rights in the vicinity of Fairview Avenue North and Valley Street; authorizing acquisition by condemnation, if necessary; authorizing provision of relocation benefits to qualified displaced persons; and authorizing the use of funds from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund for certain preliminary costs associated with the Fairview-Valley corridor realignment project.
